message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and your interest, I propose a price of $9500. This is a special offer considering the significant worth this product holds for both of us.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. This is my top offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your proposal, I would like to counter with a price of $8700. This is the highest I can go while still ensuring a reasonable profit for myself.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $8500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
